content:
Hi everyone!

This is a funny question. I missed Lean3's Goal accomplished :tada: very much. In Lean4 it changed into a plain No Goals. Is there a way to modify the text show up after I prove all the goals? Thanks! :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:

This got switched to "no goals" for the time being since it's really confusing when Lean 4 says "Goals accomplished :tada:" when actually there are still some goals but there's a parse error somewhere.
Once it's not confusing, I'm sure it will be back.
The discussion about all this is gathered in https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/issues/1970 and https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/issues/1971.

Kyle Miller said:

This got switched to "no goals" for the time being since it's really confusing when Lean 4 says "Goals accomplished :tada:" when actually there are still some goals but there's a parse error somewhere.

Oh I see! :partying_face: Thank you! Looking forward to see "Goals accomplished :tada:" again!
Jiang Jiedong has marked this topic as resolved.
